Literature.Title: Total structure and inhibition of tumor cell proliferation of laxaphycins
Literature.Author: Bonnard I, Rolland M, Salmon JM, Debiton E, Barthomeuf C, Banaigs B

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse fibroblasts L929:IC50=0.6 µM,Human fibroblasts:IC50=0.4 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human ovarian carcinoma PA1(IC50=0.19±0.03µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=1µM),Human metastatic malignant melanoma M4Beu(IC50=0.4±0.03µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=1.0±0.12µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma DLD-1(IC50=6µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=0.8±0.01µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia CCRF-CEM(IC50=1.11±0.15µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia CCRF-CEM/VM-1(IC50=1.37±0.15µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia CCRF-CEM/VLB100(IC50=1.02±0.05µM)
